name: PushBots – Web Push Notifications
author: PushBots

sections.description: Increase user engagement, retention and life-time-value for your app and website via the power of push messaging. This plugin uses PushBots.com service and requires you to have a working account. With the plugin and a PushBots account, you will be able to reach out to your WordPress visitors with desktop push notifications. Now supporting Chrome, Firefox, Opera and Safari.
sections.installation:
1. Install PushBots from the WordPress.org plugin directory or by uploading the PushBots plugin folder to your wp-content/plugins directory.
  2. Active the PushBots plugin from your WordPress settings dashboard.
  3. Follow the instructions on the Setup page.
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

  • Update plugin compatibility, now supports up to WP 5.4.x.
  • Fix sending notifications.

1.0.10

  • Update plugin compatibility, now supports up to WP 5.3.x.

1.0.9

  • Remove deprecated GCM sender ID as the plugin now supports only VAPID.

1.0.8

  • Fix safari push ID bug.

1.0.5

  • Fix bug of sending notifications on saving draft.

1.0.2

  • Default values bug fix.

1.0.0

  • Initial release of the plugin
